questions.title: 难道我们不能忘记不开心的事重新在一起吗？
questions.answer: Can't we let unhappy things leave and get together again?

questions.title: 难道我们一生都不能让自己每晚可以安然入睡吗？
questions.answer: Can't we have a nice sleep every night in lifetime?

questions.title: 事已如此，难道我们不能一起勇敢地面对吗？
questions.answer: Now it's done, can't we face it together bravely?

questions.title: 即使世界在变，难道我们不能保持真心不变吗？
questions.answer: Even the world changes, can't we keep our heart?

title: ——难道我们不能先吃吗？我饿了。
——等待长辈是礼貌的表现。

answer.en: Can't we have a dinner first?I'm starving.
It's good manners to wait for elders.

title: ——难道我们一定要面对这样的结局吗？别忘了你对我的承诺。
——我的承诺没有价值。

answer.en: Can't we have to avoid this result?Don't forget what you have promisedme.
None of my promise is valuable.

title: ——难道我们不能自驾游到西藏吗？
——这很危险，我们不知道将会发生什么。

answer.en: Can't we have a self-driving tour in the car to Tibet?
It's very dangerous and we can't know what will happen.
